segments.text: I'm thirsty . Pull over to that store , I'll buy some drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't . Parking is not allowed here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too bad , Where can you park around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a square in front of us . We can park the car there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure , you know I'm not familiar with the city , too .
segments.speaker: S2
